title: Creates a state board for national certification of school nurse grant program
summary: Creates a state board for national certification of school nurse grant program.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          498

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GUNTHER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. MOLINA-
         RO,  RAIA  -- read once and referred to the Committee on Higher Educa-
         tion

       AN ACT to amend the education  law,  in  relation  to  compensation  for
         national board certification for school nurses

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The education law is amended by adding a new article 20  to
    2  read as follows:
    3                                 ARTICLE 20
    4         STATE BOARD FOR CERTIFICATION OF SCHOOL NURSE GRANT PROGRAM
    5  SECTION 950. STATE  BOARD  FOR  NATIONAL  CERTIFICATION  OF SCHOOL NURSE
    6                 GRANT PROGRAM.
    7    S 950. STATE BOARD FOR NATIONAL CERTIFICATION OF  SCHOOL  NURSE  GRANT
    8  PROGRAM.  1.    NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY  INCONSISTENT PROVISION OF LAW, THE
    9  COMMISSIONER SHALL ESTABLISH THE STATE BOARD FOR NATIONAL  CERTIFICATION
   10  OF  SCHOOL  NURSE  GRANT PROGRAM, TO BE USED BY THE DEPARTMENT TO DEFRAY
   11  ANY COSTS INCURRED BY AN ELIGIBLE REGISTERED SCHOOL NURSE, AS THAT  TERM
   12  IS  DESCRIBED IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS SECTION AND HIS OR HER SPONSOR-
   13  ING SCHOOL DISTRICT, WHERE SUCH  ELIGIBLE  NURSE  SEEKS  NATIONAL  BOARD
   14  CERTIFICATION  FROM THE NATIONAL BOARD FOR CERTIFICATION OF SCHOOL NURS-
   15  ES.
   16    2. AS USED IN THIS SECTION, "ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSE" SHALL MEAN  A  NEW
   17  YORK STATE REGISTERED SCHOOL NURSE WHO:
   18    (A) IS CURRENTLY EMPLOYED IN A NEW YORK STATE PUBLIC SCHOOL; AND
   19    (B)  HOLDS A VALID NEW YORK STATE LICENSE AS A REGISTERED PROFESSIONAL
   20  NURSE PURSUANT TO SECTION SIXTY-NINE HUNDRED FIVE OF THIS CHAPTER.
   21    3. UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION  AND  SUBJECT  TO  THE  FILING
   22  REQUIREMENT DESCRIBED IN SUBDIVISION FOUR OF THIS SECTION, A GRANT IN AN
   23  AMOUNT  OF  UP TO THREE HUNDRED DOLLARS SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE FROM THE

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02090-01-1

       A. 498                              2

    1  STATE BOARD FOR NATIONAL CERTIFICATION OF SCHOOL NURSE GRANT PROGRAM  TO
    2  EACH  ELIGIBLE  SCHOOL  NURSE TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF CERTIFICATION BY
    3  THE NATIONAL BOARD FOR CERTIFICATION OF  SCHOOL  NURSES.  SUCH  SUM  MAY
    4  INCLUDE THE DIRECT REIMBURSEMENT BY THE DEPARTMENT TO THE ELIGIBLE NURS-
    5  ES'  SPONSORING  SCHOOL DISTRICT FROM THE TOTAL GRANT AWARD TO COVER THE
    6  COST OF HIRING A SUBSTITUTE SCHOOL NURSE FOR UP TO  THREE  DAYS  OR  THE
    7  DURATION OF SUCH ELIGIBLE NURSE'S APPROVED LEAVE, WHICHEVER IS LESS.
    8    4.  THE  COMMISSIONER  SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR PROMULGATING ANY REGU-
    9  LATIONS NECESSARY TO EFFECTUATE THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION,  INCLUD-
   10  ING:
   11    (A)  ESTABLISHING WITHIN THE DEPARTMENT AN APPLICATION FORM AND FILING
   12  DEADLINE REQUIREMENTS TO BE UTILIZED BY ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSES  APPLYING
   13  FOR  A  GRANT  FROM THE STATE BOARD FOR NATIONAL CERTIFICATION OF SCHOOL
   14  NURSE GRANT PROGRAM;
   15    (B) ESTABLISHING A MECHANISM FOR PROCESSING AND APPROVING APPLICATIONS
   16  WITHIN THE DEPARTMENT;
   17    (C) ESTABLISHING A MECHANISM TO  ALLOCATE  GRANT  AWARDS  TO  APPROVED
   18  ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSES; AND
   19    (D)  ESTABLISHING A MECHANISM TO REIMBURSE SPONSORING SCHOOL DISTRICTS
   20  FOR UP TO THREE DAYS OF APPROVED LEAVE AS DESCRIBED IN SUBDIVISION THREE
   21  OF THIS SECTION.
   22    5. AN ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSE FOR WHOM THE STATE  PAYS  A  PARTICIPATION
   23  FEE SHALL BE LIABLE FOR REPAYMENT OF THE GRANT TO THE DEPARTMENT IF SUCH
   24  ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSE:
   25    (A) DOES NOT COMPLETE THE PROCESS; OR
   26    (B)  COMPLETES  THE  PROCESS,  BUT  DOES  NOT WORK IN A NEW YORK STATE
   27  PUBLIC SCHOOL FOR AT LEAST ONE FULL YEAR AFTER ACHIEVING NATIONAL  BOARD
   28  CERTIFICATION.
   29    6. REPAYMENT OF THE GRANT IS NOT REQUIRED:
   30    (A)  IF  THE CERTIFICATION PROCESS IS NOT COMPLETED OR IF THE ELIGIBLE
   31  SCHOOL NURSE FAILS TO WORK FOR ONE FULL YEAR AFTER COMPLETION DUE TO HIS
   32  OR HER DEATH OR DISABILITY OR SOME OTHER  EXTENUATING  CIRCUMSTANCES  AS
   33  MAY BE RECOGNIZED BY THE BOARD OF REGENTS; OR
   34    (B)  IF  THE  ELIGIBLE SCHOOL NURSE COMPLETES THE PROCESS BUT DOES NOT
   35  ACHIEVE CERTIFICATION.
   36    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
